text:
@PressSec Death-count 7/6 in countries that took prompt aggressive action:

S. Korea: 284
Japan: 977
Hong Kong: 7
Taiwan: 7
NZ: 22
AU: 106

The US where #Trump called COVID-19 a hoax & ignored it for 70 days, faced huge deficit of ventilators/masks/PPEs
US COVID-19 Death Toll Tops 132,610.
